text: "A Hard Day's Night" is a 1964 song by The Beatles and is the title track to their third studio album A Hard Day's Night. It was taken from the 1964 movie A Hard Day's Night. It topped the single charts in Australia, Canada, Finland, Ireland, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, South Africa, Sweden, the United Kingdom and the United States. == References == Category:1964 songs Category:The Beatles songs Category:Dionne Warwick songs Category:Otis Redding songs Category:Chet Atkins songs Category:Rock songs
title: A Hard Day's Night (song)
